title: Poster, Exhibition Poster: Nicholas Grimshaw & Partners, Structure, Space and Skin, Royal Institiute of British Architects, London, 1993
title_raw: Exhibition Poster: Nicholas Grimshaw & Partners, Structure, Space and Skin, Royal Institiute of British Architects, London
description:
Exhibition poster for work of Nicholas Grimshaw & Partners from 1988-1993 at Royal Institute of British Architects.
Color photo reproduction of interior of aluminum structure with curved walls supported by steel grid design.  Imprinted in white, lower right: "The Work of Nicholas Grimshaw & Partners, 1988-1993/ Strcuture, Space and Skin/ an exhibition of Models, Mock-ups,/ Prototypes and Drawings./  At the Royal Institute of British Architects, 66 Portland Place, London W1/ Monday 10 May 1993 - Saturday 29 May 1993./  10.00am - 5.30 pm Weekdays./ 10.00 am - 4.00 pm Weekends."

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, Exhibition Poster: Nicholas Grimshaw & Partners, Structure, Space and Skin, Royal Institiute of British Architects, London, 1993. Offset lithography. 
Gift of Unknown Donor. 1994-114-32
